Package model.db

Class MongoDBHandler

java.lang.Object
model.db.MongoDBHandler
public class MongoDBHandler extends Object
This class receives the MongoDBConfig, establishes the connection, and is responsible for interacting with the database.
Since:
09:52 2025/3/11
Author:
Li Min, Jiadong Zhou
